module.name: non_manifold_surface
module.keywords: module, non manifold, topology, elementary curve, elementary surface, surface model

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of of geometric shapes by means of non-manifold surface models. It includes the geometric and topological resources to define non-manifolds that may consist of elementary and sculptured curves and surfaces.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Elemental geometric shape, ISO/TS 10303-1004.
